translation.en: They say that when you die,
your life flashes before your eyes.
translation.es: ves pasar escenas de tu vida.

translation.en: Bring your awareness to your breath.
…collected together to remind you of all the incredible things…
translation.es: Una selección que te recuerda todas las cosas increíbles…

translation.en: If you could control that flashback
and live in the moment again…
Something is up. You know I can always tell with you.
translation.es: Te pasa algo. Sabes que siempre me doy cuenta.

translation.en: What… what do you mean seeing something?
It's always vague and in my periphery.
translation.es: Es difuso y lo veo en la periferia.

translation.en: He was this thing when we were growing up. This… this, like, vulture skull creature, and--
translation.es: Era un personaje de nuestra infancia. Una criatura con calavera de buitre…

translation.en: No. You're right. You're right. It sounds mad.
translation.es: No, tienes razón. Es una locura.

translation.en: Well, saying it out loud, it does sound a bit crazy.
translation.es: Ahora que lo oigo, parece una locura.

translation.en: Uh, tell me again why we have, uh, Vulture Man in here every night.
translation.es: Recuérdame por qué el Hombre Buitre duerme con nosotros.

translation.en: and he makes me feel safe.
I thought that was my job.
translation.es: Creí que ese era mi trabajo.

translation.en: Well, every hero needs a sidekick.
He's on your street, and he's in your home, sound the alarm
translation.es: Está en tu calle y está en tu casa. Haz sonar la alarma.

translation.en: Get off. God, you're such a kid.
Fine. The doll can stay. Yes!
translation.es: - Está bien, el muñeco se puede quedar. - ¡Sí!

translation.en: - And you know that tatty old thing with… - Rude.
translation.es: - Esa cosa vieja y gastada… - Qué grosero.

translation.en: Well, it would actually look much nicer in a… in a nursery
translation.es: …se vería mucho mejor en un cuarto de bebé con otros juguetes menos aterradores,

translation.en: surrounded by some other slightly less terrifying toys,
translation.es: en un cuarto de bebé con otros juguetes menos aterradores,

translation.en: I love you more than chips.
translation.es: te amo más que a las patatas.

translation.en: - That's a lot. - That is a lot.
And if it finally gets you to decorate that spare room,
translation.es: Y si por esa razón al fin decoras el cuarto libre,

translation.en: - I have to ask you something, actually. - Mm- hmm.
- Go check it out. - Why me?
If you wanna be Dr. Bones' sidekick, you're gonna have to prove yourself.
translation.es: Demuestra que puedes ser el compinche del Dr. Bones.

translation.en: All right, look, if I'm not back in five minutes,
translation.es: Si no vuelvo en cinco minutos,

translation.en: - I didn't mean it. He just came at me. - Scott?
translation.es: - No quise hacerlo. Se me abalanzó. - ¿Scott?

translation.en: I need to find Scott. Warn him.
translation.es: Debo hallar a Scott y advertirle.

translation.en: Jess, you having a good birthday, love? Go follow your friends.
translation.es: ¿Te diviertes en tu cumpleaños? Ve con tus amigos.

translation.en: You haven't started. How've you been shot already?
Someone broke into the apartment. Scott is dead! And they shot me!
translation.es: Alguien entró al apartamento. ¡Mataron a Scott! ¡Y me dispararon!

translation.en: Gross. Jess, what are you doing?
I… I just saw you dead!
You have to stay away from me!
In twelve years' time, we work together at a local gym.
translation.es: En 12 años, trabajamos en el mismo gimnasio.

translation.en: You as a PT and me as a yoga instructor.
translation.es: Tú eres fisioterapeuta y yo enseño yoga.

translation.en: It's my 25th birthday and all my friends forget
translation.es: Cuando cumplo 25 años, todos lo olvidan y me invitas a un feo restorán italiano

translation.en: so you take me to the worst Italian place in the city,
translation.es: todos lo olvidan y me invitas a un feo restorán italiano

translation.en: and we eat spaghetti bolognese like Lady and the Tramp.
translation.es: y comemos fideos como en La dama y el vagabundo.

translation.en: - What are you talking about, Jess? - I get wine drunk.
Slip and hurt my ankle. You offer to drive me home, and I accept.
translation.es: Me resbalo y lastimo el tobillo. Ofreces llevarme a casa y acepto.

translation.en: You carry me all the way to my door, and it's the third- floor apartment.
translation.es: Subes los tres pisos del edificio conmigo a cuestas.

translation.en: You're so tired you end up passed out on my sofa watching The Office on Netflix.
translation.es: Te cansas tanto que te duermes en mi sofá viendo The Office en Netflix.

translation.en: In the morning, we have breakfast,
and you tell me you've liked me since we were 13.
translation.es: y me dices que te gusto desde los 13 años.

translation.en: So you'll have to promise me you'll do what I say.
translation.es: Prométeme que harás lo que te diga.

translation.en: Battle commences in T- minus one minute.
translation.es: La batalla comienza en un minuto.

translation.en: I really need you to understand.
Maybe if we never get together, things will change.
translation.es: Quizá si no salimos, las cosas cambiarán.

translation.en: Jess, I didn't know there would be a Dr. Bones here as well.
translation.es: Jess, no sabía que habría un Dr. Bones.

translation.en: Scott, I need you to promise you'll never talk to me again.
translation.es: Scott, necesito que me prometas que nunca volverás a hablarme.

translation.en: We can't get into a relationship. If we do, we both die.
translation.es: No podemos tener una relación. Si salimos, moriremos.

translation.en: - You've got to believe me. - Okay.
- I believe you. I won't talk to you again. - Please.
translation.es: - Te creo. Ya no te hablaré. - Por favor.

translation.en: It's okay. It's okay, it's time.
I love you more than chips.
translation.es: Te amo más que a las patatas.

translation.en: And if I'm not back in five minutes,
translation.es: Y si no vuelvo en cinco minutos,

translation.en: for allowing you to practice today.
What if you could change the past?
translation.es: ¿Qué tal si pudieras cambiar el pasado?

translation.en: Avoid what went wrong the first time around?
translation.es: ¿Evitar lo que salió mal la primera vez?

translation.en: What if you're presented with an opportunity
translation.es: ¿Qué tal si te dan la oportunidad

translation.en: Even if it leads to someone else's happy ending?
translation.es: ¿Aun si conduce al final feliz de alguien más?

translation.en: I've got all the time in the world to find mine.
translation.es: Tengo todo el tiempo del mundo para encontrar el mío.

translation.en: He's on your street And he's in your home
translation.es: Está en tu calle y está en tu casa.
